items.content_html: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.
items.title: oi-overide/oi: Overide (pronounced over¬∑ide) is a lightweight, yet powerful CLI tool that seamlessly integrates AI-powered code generation into your development workflow. It works platform-agnostically with OpenAI, DeepSeek, and Groq to provide intelligent code updates directly in your preferred code editor - no extensions required.

items.content_html: AnyGrid is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Warp and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
